includedAssets.title: The New Rachel
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel's Big Apple adventure gets off to a shaky start, while in Lima, the search for new choir members is on. Kate Hudson guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rachel's Big Apple adventure gets off to a shaky start, while in Lima, the search for new choir members is on. Kate Hudson guest stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rachel's Big Apple adventure gets off to a shaky start, while in Lima, the search for new choir members is on. Kate Hudson guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Britney 2.0
includedAssets.synopsis: With Brittany S Pierce down in the dumps, Mr Shue hopes the music of her icon will cheer her up. In NYC, Rachel has a point to prove to Cassie (Kate Hudson).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Brittany S Pierce down in the dumps, Mr Shue hopes the music of her icon will cheer her up. In NYC, Rachel has a point to prove to Cassie.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Brittany S Pierce down in the dumps, Mr Shue hopes the music of her icon will cheer her up. In NYC, Rachel has a point to prove to Cassie (Kate Hudson).

includedAssets.title: Makeover
includedAssets.synopsis: Kurt hopes to impress a fashion bigwig, and Rachel grows closer to Brody. In Lima, the race for Senior Class President begins. Sarah Jessica Parker guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Kurt hopes to impress a fashion bigwig, and Rachel grows closer to Brody. In Lima, the race for Senior Class President begins.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Kurt hopes to impress a fashion bigwig, and Rachel grows closer to Brody. In Lima, the race for Senior Class President begins. Sarah Jessica Parker guest stars.

includedAssets.title: The Break-Up
includedAssets.synopsis: When Finn visits NYC he becomes unsure how he fits into Rachel's new life. Blaine makes a confession to Kurt, while Brittany and Santana come to a decision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Finn visits NYC he becomes unsure how he fits into Rachel's new life. Blaine makes a confession to Kurt.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Finn visits NYC he becomes unsure how he fits into Rachel's new life. Blaine makes a confession to Kurt, while Brittany and Santana come to a decision.

includedAssets.title: The Role You Were Born to Play
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep5 - The Role You Were Born to Play
includedAssets.synopsis: As auditions for Grease begin, Artie hopes to cheer up Finn. Footballer Ryder Lynn (The Glee Project's Blake Jenner) meets the gang.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As auditions for Grease begin, Artie hopes to cheer up Finn. Footballer Ryder Lynn (The Glee Project's Blake Jenner) meets the gang.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As auditions for Grease begin, Artie hopes to cheer up Finn. Footballer Ryder Lynn (The Glee Project's Blake Jenner) meets the gang.

includedAssets.title: Glease
includedAssets.synopsis: Greased Lightning hits McKinley on the opening night of the musical. Santana, Rachel and Kurt return to Lima, while Kitty steps up her vendetta against Marley.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Greased Lightning hits McKinley on the opening night of the musical. Santana, Rachel and Kurt return to Lima.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Greased Lightning hits McKinley on the opening night of the musical. Santana, Rachel and Kurt return to Lima, while Kitty steps up her vendetta against Marley.

includedAssets.title: Dynamic Duets
includedAssets.synopsis: While Finn hopes to unite the warring New Directions by dividing them into pairs to perform duets, the Dalton Academy Warblers make their presence felt.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Finn hopes to unite the warring New Directions by dividing them into pairs to perform duets. The Dalton Academy Warblers make their presence felt.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Finn hopes to unite the warring New Directions by dividing them into pairs to perform duets, the Dalton Academy Warblers make their presence felt.

includedAssets.title: Thanksgiving
includedAssets.synopsis: Finn enlists his former buddies to help mentor the New Directions through Sectionals, while in NYC, Rachel & Kurt's quiet celebration doesn't quite go to plan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Finn enlists his former buddies to help mentor the New Directions through Sectionals.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Finn enlists his former buddies to help mentor the New Directions through Sectionals, while in NYC, Rachel & Kurt's quiet celebration doesn't quite go to plan.

includedAssets.title: Swan Song
includedAssets.synopsis: While the New Directions face a crisis, Rachel receives an almost unprecedented honour and Kurt gets a second chance. Kate Hudson & Whoopi Goldberg guest star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While the New Directions face a crisis, Rachel receives an almost unprecedented honour and Kurt gets a second chance.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While the New Directions face a crisis, Rachel receives an almost unprecedented honour and Kurt gets a second chance. Kate Hudson & Whoopi Goldberg guest star.

includedAssets.title: Glee, Actually
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Christmas at McKinley and the Puckerman brothers take steps to mend their dysfunctional family.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Christmas at McKinley and the Puckerman brothers take steps to mend their dysfunctional family.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's Christmas at McKinley and the Puckerman brothers take steps to mend their dysfunctional family.

includedAssets.title: Sadie Hawkins
includedAssets.synopsis: Secret crushes are revealed when the girls must ask the guys to McKinley's first Sadie Hawkins dance. In NYC, Kurt has his head turned by a British student.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Secret crushes are revealed when the girls must ask the guys to McKinley's first Sadie Hawkins dance.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Secret crushes are revealed when the girls must ask the guys to McKinley's first Sadie Hawkins dance. In NYC, Kurt has his head turned by a British student.

includedAssets.title: Naked
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel wrestles with her conscience when she's offered a film role that comes with a catch. Over in Lima, the boys get their kits off for a sexy calendar shoot.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rachel wrestles with her conscience when she's offered a film role that comes with a catch.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rachel wrestles with her conscience when she's offered a film role that comes with a catch. Over in Lima, the boys get their kits off for a sexy calendar shoot.

includedAssets.title: Diva
includedAssets.synopsis: Finn hopes a visit from Santana will inspire the New Directions to unleash their inner divas, while, in New York, Kurt attempts to curb Rachel's diva tendencies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Finn hopes a visit from Santana will inspire the New Directions to unleash their inner divas.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Finn hopes a visit from Santana will inspire the New Directions to unleash their inner divas, while, in New York, Kurt attempts to curb Rachel's diva tendencies.

includedAssets.title: I Do
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Will and Emma's big day but will pre-wedding nerves prove to be too much for them? McKinley's class of 2012 is reunited, leading to a night to remember for many.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's Will and Emma's big day but will pre-wedding nerves prove to be too much for them? McKinley's class of 2012 is reunited.

includedAssets.title: Girls (And Boys) On Film
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep15 - Girls (And Boys) On Film
includedAssets.synopsis: Will tasks the New Directions with performing aspirational songs from their favourite movies, leading to Glee's landmark 500th musical number.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Will tasks the New Directions with performing aspirational songs from their favourite movies, leading to Glee's landmark 500th musical number.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Will tasks the New Directions with performing aspirational songs from their favourite movies, leading to Glee's landmark 500th musical number.

includedAssets.title: Feud
includedAssets.synopsis: The kids hope to force Finn and Mr Schue to sort out their problems with an assignment based on epic musical feuds. Santana sets out to prove she's right about Brody.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The kids hope to force Finn and Mr Schue to sort out their problems with an assignment based on epic musical feuds.

includedAssets.title: Guilty Pleasures
includedAssets.synopsis: Girl power surges through McKinley when Sam and Blaine inspire the gang to reveal their secret musical loves. In New York, Rachel finally confronts Brody.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Girl power surges through McKinley when Sam and Blaine inspire the gang to reveal their secret musical loves.

includedAssets.title: Shooting Star
includedAssets.synopsis: A seemingly regular day at McKinley takes an unexpected and terrifying turn when an unthinkable event has lasting consequences for the school.

includedAssets.title: Sweet Dreams
includedAssets.synopsis: Shelby (Idina Menzel) helps Rachel look at her Funny Girl audition from a different perspective, while in Lima, Finn gets a surprising new college roommate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Shelby (Idina Menzel) helps Rachel look at her Funny Girl audition from a different perspective.

includedAssets.title: Lights Out
includedAssets.synopsis: A power cut forces the New Directions to go unplugged, Sue revels in a new career and, in New York, Isabelle (Sarah Jessica Parker) has wise words for Santana.

includedAssets.title: Wonder-Ful
includedAssets.synopsis: It's Stevie Wonder week in this penultimate episode. Mike and Mercedes visit McKinley, while Rachel worries that Cassie could scupper her Funny Girl chances.

includedAssets.title: All or Nothing
includedAssets.synopsis: Season four concludes as Regionals arrive and Brittany's MIT interview reaps unexpected results. Rachel has one last chance to win the role of a lifetime.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kate Hudson and Whoopi Goldberg guest star in season four of the hit musical drama, which welcomes new arrivals to the glee club and sees Rachel embark on her Big Apple adventure.

includedIn.title: Glee
includedIn.synopsis: The William McKinley High School glee club, New Directions, attempt to compete on the highly competitive show choir circuit, while dealing with social issues and learning to work as a team.
